text: “E inu amene mwakhulupirira! Perekani zabwino zochokera m’zimene mwapeza ndi zimene takutulutsirani m’nthaka, ndipo musalinge kupereka choipa chomwe inu simukadachilandira (ngati akanakupatsani) pokhapokha mochitsinzinira. (Nanga Allah ndiye alandire choipacho)? Ndipo dziwani kuti Allah Ngolemera (ndiponso) Ngotamandidwa
